Question
========
After editing a Quarto `.qmd` file in Positron, how do you view the rendered document?

Answerlist
----------
* Click the Preview button; the render shows in the Viewer pane or an external browser depending on your settings
* Restart Positron so Quarto auto-renders on launch
* Save the file and open it manually in a separate word processor
* Quarto documents cannot be previewed from within Positron

Solution
========
Use the Preview button to render; the output appears in the integrated viewer or an external browser based on the Quarto extension setting.
